runs.comm: presses forward, defends, gets a single off the inside half of the bat
turn and bounce there, Shiv gets behind it, plays with soft hands, gets a single off the outer half of the bat
flighted around off, comes forward and defends
tight around the off stump, CG defends
beauty! angling in, pitching middle and off, biting away, bouncing too, beats him after having drawn him forward
flatter, quicker, defended
length ball on the pads, worked away behind square on the leg side
short and wide, Shiv lets it go
short, into the ribs, Shiv stands tall and defends
shapes away from the left-hand batsman, left alone outside off
shorter, just outside off, defended
full and wide, swinging away, left alone
short, CG waits, rocks back, and pulls in front of square. powerful strike, but Gambhir from deep midwicket makes a sliding save
swept for six! Doesn't even bend properly, just a lovely connection on this length ball, and over square leg. Sweet as
outside off this time, and he leaves it alone
cuts this one, Jadeja gets a hand on it at point
topspinner around off, stays on the crease and defends
turn and bounce again, Shiv goes back and defends it to point
hint of swing, around off, and defended
heaves, from middle and leg, against the swing, and finds a vacant area around square leg
smashed down the ground, shimmies down, doesn't matter if it is short, he just slaps it past mid-off. Power maan
good delivery, swinging from middle and off, height saves him as he is beaten. Gets a leg-bye
into the pads, worked away to deep square leg
CG is in his element, it seems, charges down the track, makes room, and bludgeons this short ball over mid-on. If he was describing this on his Twitter, Gayle would end with "blessed"
oh oh oh, sharp turn and bounce, beats, hits something and carries to slip. They appeal, not given! Looks like off the elbow
soft hands, works it to short fine for one
stays back to look to pull, it stays low, gets him in the thigh
sharp bounce, almost chest high for Dhoni, beats him with the turn
presses right forward and defends
flatter, Gayle stays back to defend
fast and flat and defended
looks to reverse-sweep, but it is way down what would be his leg side. Not called wide. That's strange. Gets a wide
short, pulled fine, and Jadeja lets this through his legs at short fine leg
fired way down the leg side
flat, around off, punched towards cover
angled into the pads, doesn't get bat on it
short ball, worked wide of mid-on for one
hit back to Raina, powerfully but straight to him
full, angled in, hit to deep midwicket
reverse-lap this time, beats short third man, and in a display of India-Pakistan running between the wickets, they convert this three into two
short ball, defended
looks to sweep, is beaten, and there is a huge shout but it hits him outside the line of off
this is a not a reverse-sweep, no. This is a reverse-pull, makes his mind up early, gets a short ball, and manages to hit it over point
fired into the pads, doesn't get bat on it
short and pulled to deep square leg for one
short, into the body, worked away for one
comes down the track, Yusuf bowls short, gets only a single to long-on

Jadeja drops another! Difficult catch but he had got under it. Shiv pre-meditates the sweep, it bounces extra, takes the top edge over short fine, Jadeja makes good ground, does well to get under it, but it spills out
better running this time, worked with soft hands into the leg side, and they rush back for two before the square leg fielder can comes in
low full toss, hit down to long-off for one
full, into the pads, pushed to long-on for one
length ball, just what Gayle has been looking for, goes deep into the crease, and plays the pick-up over wide long-on. Sweet as
works this one into the on side for one
looks to run this down to third man, and is beaten by the seam movement away from him
shot! Shiv's innovation! Goes right across the stumps, and pulls this fine, using all of Zak's pace to get it to fine leg for four
makes room, but flat and fast and defends
OMG! what a strike, flat and fast again, just sits back and murders this over long-on. Bounces on the roof, and goes out of the Kensington Oval. New balls please
full and fast, defended towards extra cover
flighted outside off, Gayle goes for a huge shot, gets an inside edge that misses the stumps
full, around off, pushed to long-off for one
short and flat, punched to long-off for one
defended off the back foot
full, around off, driven to wide of long-off for two
low full toss, drilled to long-on for one
topspinner, Shiv plays for the spin, is nearly beaten by the straight delivery
short, into the pads, worked away for one
fired in outside off, gets a single to extra cover
starts off with a wide down the leg side

communication breakdown! Gayle stands back to send this out of the ground, but gets too much under it and skies it to basically nowhere. Yusuf gets under it, but nobody has called for it, and Dhoni runs in and almost takes it out of his hand and drops it. Both men are on their feet, thankfully
worked away to square leg for one
outside edge, and a meaty one, which bounces once before going to the third-man boundary. Fifty up
length ball, worked away to square leg for one
finally they hold on to a catch! Shiv makes room and swings, gets a top edge on this short delivery, and Dhoni runs back and claims this striker
good ball, moves away late and beats him outside off
Sammy pushes this length ball to long-off for one
full toss, brutalised over midwicket. Flat, flat six. Thank you very much
flat ball, into the pads, inside edge towards short fine for one

not the week for Jadeja! What a sweet sweet shot, just a chip, high elbow and all, and this is lofted over long-off for another six. Jadeja proves the famous saying that if it's not your Friday, sometimes it's not your Sunday either. Okay not so famous. Okay I only invented it
over the wicket now, full toss, long-on, one run
full ball, drilled to long-on for one
good yorker, swinging into the pads, can't do much with it
he knows there is not going to be any room, and backs away early and gets this length ball over square leg for four
backs away, he follows him with a yorker, gets an inside edge
low full toss, hit flat and fast, and gets it wide of sweeper-cover, all along the ground. Sammy is hitting sweetly today
gets this yorker right, sent back as it is hit straight to short cover
full ball, just short of a yorker, hit down to long-on for one
into the pads, worked away to square leg for one
Bludgeon! Sammy is a smart guy, just goes down to the ground as soon as he sees Gayle is going to hit straight. No chance for long-on
fired in, hit back to the bowler
angled into the pads, worked away for one
flat, punched back down the ground, Yusuf gets a hand to it, but they take a single
bottom edge as he looks for the big shot, gets a single to short fine
fired into the pads. gets a single to short fine
length ball, and he has driven it damn straight, bisecting long-on and long-off, all along the ground
and Jadeja gets a wicket! Stop the press! Low full toss, and Sammy is sort of cramped for room, and doesn't get enough power into it and hits it down long-on's lap
yorker, hit back to Jadeja
he has flicked, and I kid you not, he has just caressed this, a low full toss, into the first tier behind long-on. Eighty-eight metres it goes. What a strike
fired into the pads, doesn't do much with it, defends it back
short ball, on middle stump, and he rocks back and pulls it for a flat six. Old-fashioned long hop
slog-sweep attempted, misses, huge shout for lbw, the umpire sees no turn and gives him not out, thinking it would go down the angle. Hawk-eye agrees
worked into the leg side for one
rubbish won't be too harsh a word for this delivery, nice juicy long hop, and he pulls it for a huge six. On a day he has been announced as India's captain for the Zimbabwe tour
fired into the pads, hit to deep midwicket for one
looks to cut this, gets the toe end of the bat for one
half-volley outside off and he swings and misses
swing away from him, gets a thick edge for one to third man
full, into the pads, cramps him, but he gets it into the gap on the on side, and comes back for two despite slipping on the turn back
well bowled, follows him with a yorker, gets some bat on it, takes a single to short third

mis-hit for six! Short of his preferred length and he gets too much under it, but it still carries into the stand behind cow corner. Hilariously Yuvraj at the edge of the inner circle lines up for the catch, and then is wondering what the hell happened
full, around off, hit to long-off for one
full ball, around leg, hit to long-on for one, couldn't get under it
and they can just watch and admire! Low full toss, clears the front leg, and sends it into the roof behind midwicket
well bowled, this yorker is outside off, and he has backed away too early
gets the yorker right again, will get a single to long-on
good catch. Zaheer cramps him up by following him down the leg side, and his flick carries towards wide long-on. Yusuf runs from long-on and claims the catch

greedy Gayle! gets a no-ball, hits it straight to long-on and wants a second so that he can face the free hit. Bravo sends him back, rightly so. He actually slipped while turning, and Bravo, who wanted the second, sent him back
full toss, hit down to long-on, no power, gets one
and he has flicked it straight to midwicket. No timing again, it is a length ball, and he chips it straight to the fielder
length ball, following him, and hit straight to deep square leg, and they decide not to risk Bhajji's arm
and another wicket! Sarwan slogs, and it's not full enough for the shot, and top-edges this to midwicket

poor, limp throw from deep midwicket, and what a dive from Gayle! Still Gayle is gone! Hit to deep midwicket, and Karthik throws in weakly, it bounces twice or thrice before reaching Dhoni. Gayle dives full length, makes it, but the bat bobs up on impact. Unfortunate way to get out
well bowled, yorker wide outside off, just inside the wide line, dot ball
Ramdin gives them a desired end after a superb over from Nehra, moves all the way across, and flicks this ball from off-stump line to fine of short fine leg
